definitions.definition: Outside of the normal curriculum of an educational establishment .
examples: The students enjoy a number of extracurricular activities at weekends.

definitions.definition: Similarly outside of the normal duties of a job or profession .
Extramarital . (Can we add an example for this sense?)

main_definition: Outside of the normal curriculum of an educational establishment .
secondary_definitions: Similarly outside of the normal duties of a job or profession .
( informal ) Extramarital . (Can we add an example for this sense?)
